title: Start
body:
<<BGM GlobalStats Neutral>>
<<layerSet Dialogue 2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<expression Aig AOSF>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
*cough*
*cough cough*
*COUGH COUGH COUGH*
<<expression Aig NNSF>>
Ahhhhgggg....ow.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<move Lee StageLeft2>>
Greetings, Aigburth.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
*cough* Greetings *cough* Lee.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NONF>>
Are you ill?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
What? *cough* No, no.
I've just been spending a lot of time in the vocal studio lately, and I think I might have- 
<<expression Aig AOSF>>
*COUGH!* 
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...blown out my voice.
Which really *cough* sucks because the debut is *cough* only a week away.
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig AOSF>>
*COUGH* *COUGH* *COUGH*
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Sorry, I can't really-
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig AOSF>>
*COUGH*
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
-talk.

title: Good
body:
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee RHNF>>
Hang on, I have just the thing.
I heard that if you gargle table salt and tap water, it'll loosen up your vocal cords.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
Does that *cough* actually work?
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NHNF>>
Sure it does.
<<flip Lee>> 
<<expression Lee NHNB>>
I'll be right back.
<<expression Lee NHNF>>
<<expression Aig AOSF>>
<<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
*cough* *cough* *cough*
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Ack! Oof.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<flip Lee>>
<<move Lee StageLeft1>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
Here you are.
<<move Lee CenterStage>>
<<expression Lee NHNF>>
Drink.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Lee, I don't know about *cough* this.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee RHNF>>
Trust me.
->Alright.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    Eh...
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    Alright.
    <<move Aig StageRight1>>
    *glug glug glug glug*
    ...
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    <<expression Aig AOSF>>
    <<move Lee StageLeft2>>
    *BLARGH!*
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    EHHH!!!
    Oh my god!
    <<expression Aig ANNF>>
    OH. MY. GOD!
    <<flip Aig>>
    Lee! That was NOT water!
    OR salt!
    What the hell was that?!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NONB>>
    ...
    w-
    ..water...
    ...and...
    ...
    <<expression Lee NONF>>
    ...salt?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    ...
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    Lee...you do know what water is, right?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNNB>>
    ...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    Lee, it's important to me that you know what water is.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee ANNF>>
    You're attacking me right now, and I don't much like that kind of thing.
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee ANNB>>
    You're welcome for fixing your voice.
    <<expression Lee ANNF>>
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ANSF>>
    Lee! You didn't-
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    ...oh,
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    ...oh my god.
    <<flip Aig>>
    My throat feels amazing!
    <<flip Aig>>
    Wait! Lee! Come back!
    <<move Aig OffStageRight>>
->I'm good.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    Thanks Lee, but, uh...*cough*...I think I'm good.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    Suit yourself.
    <<flip Lee>>
    *glug glug glug glug*
    <<expression Lee RLNF>>
    Ah!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    Lee.
    W-what are you doing?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NHNF>>
    Living my best life.
    I suggest you do the same.
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    If your throat hurts, just lay off the vocal training.
    <<expression Lee NHNF>>
    Your voice is plenty good enough for the debut, you just need to rest it for a bit.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NLNF>>
    Aw, Lee!
    That's *cough* really nice of you to say.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    ...
    ...
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NSNF>>
    ...
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNNF>>
    Farewell, Aigburth.
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    Thanks *cough* Lee!

title: Bad
body:
<<name Friendship Lee>>
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
Hm.
<<expression Lee AOSF>>
Well, it's probably because you're a bad singer.
->I am?
    <<expression Aig NOWF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    I...I am?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee RONF>>
    Yes. Of course.
    <<exprssion Lee NNNF>>
->No I'm not!
    <<expression Aig AOSF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    What are you *COUGH* talking about!? I'm a great singer!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee RONB>>
    Oh, Aigburth. I always thought you were more self aware.
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NNSF>>
    I'm dissapointed.
    <<expression Aig ANNF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    What do you mean?
<<expression Lee NNNF>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
You spend a ton of time at vocal training, and yet your vocals have barely improved at all.
<<expression Lee ANSF>>
My advice; quit while you're ahead.
<<expression Lee NNNB>>
Or...BEHIND, as it were.
<<expression Lee ANSF>>
You're just sinking time into something you obviously have no talent for.
->Screw you!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    Screw you, Lee!
    <<expression Aig ANSF>>
    I don't care what you say, and I don't care if I-
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    *COUGH*
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ANSF>>
    -blow my voice out trying!
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    I LIKE singing! 
    <<expression Aig ANSF>>
    I'm GOING to keep trying and I'm GOING to get better at it!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee ANSF>>
    ...
    <<expression Lee RHNF>>
    Hm.
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    Glad to hear it.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig AOWF>>
    AND ANOTHER THING! I'm sick and tired of-
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    Wait. What?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    Congratulations, Aigburth. You've passed my very obvious test of character.
    <<expression Lee NSSF>>
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    I just wanted to see if you'd fold under pressure.
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee NSNB>>
    Glad you didn't.
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    Y-yeah! I *COUGH* knew it was a test. Duh!
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNB>>
    Tooootally...knew it.
->I guess you're right...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    You're right...I'm wasting my time
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    I keep *COUGH* singing, and all I do is blow out my stupid voice.
    <<expression Aig NNNB>>
    I guess I'm just not a vocalist...
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    ...
    <<expression Lee ANSF>>
    Tch.
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    You're going to give up just like that?
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    B-but...YOU told me to!
    Like, just now!
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    And you just ALWAYS listen to what other people say? 
    <<flip Lee>>
    <<expression Lee ANSB>>
    Don't be a sheep, Aigburth.
    <<move Lee OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    B-but!
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    *sigh*
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    I cannot get a-
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig ROWF>>
    *COUGH*
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression NNNF>>
    -bead on that guy.
